item.description:
Hi Everyone.

We'll stay in Providence this month and brunch at CAV.

Here's their website: http://www.cavrestaur...

And their brunch menu:

Thick French toast with cinnamon and pure maple syrup $7.95
French toast a la CAV: thick slices with sautéed apples, raisins and toasted nuts in a Butterscotch maple sauce. $10.95

Belgian waffle with pure maple syrup. $7.50
Belgian waffle with strawberry thyme syrup. $8.95

Eggs Supreme: fluffy scrambled eggs with shallot sauce and sundried tomatoes served with grilled French bread and caraway herbed red Bliss potatoes. $8.95

Poached eggs with sweet red peppers garden salsa, over fresh spinach, accompanied by roasted red Bliss potatoes and grilled French bread. $8.95

Poached eggs with Applewood smoked bacon, Hollandaise sauce, served with grilled French bread and herbed roasted herbed potatoes. $9.95

Omelette filled with honey Balsamic caramelized red onions, goat cheese, tomatoes, served with red Bliss caraway potatoes and grilled French bread. $9.95

Omlette filled with sautéed fresh spinach, onions, fetta and mushrooms served with herbed roasted red Bliss potatoes and grilled French bread. $9.95

Pistachio encrusted Maryland Blue Crab cake with poached egg and grilled sweet bread served with a zesty Siracha aioli. $14.95

Scrambled eggs with Maine Lobster Toasted Sweet Bread and Thai Chile cream sauce. $16.50

Norwegian smoked salmon platter with capers, red onions, tomatoes and toasted bagel. $9.50

Tofu and vegetable scramble of the day with herbed roasted potatoes and grilled herbed bread. $8.50

Hope to see you there.

DON'T FORGET - $5.00 pf the $5.50 deposit is REFUNDED at brunch on Sunday. AND you don't need a paypal account to make your payment. Please see the full explanation on our Message Board.

Thanks

Maryanne
item.how_to_find_us: A reservation is made in my name
item.name: November Brunch - CAV in Providence
